column4: its a ubuntu issue. its a dualboot machine and the KB & mouse work perfectly on windows.
someone suggested i reinstall natty. can that be done and keep my current settings and apps
so back up that directory and then after reinstall, just drag and drop and overwrite?
If you have your /home directory on a separate partition, you can just install and leave it un-formatted and use same user name and you'll have it all there when youre done.
